Class RaLocaleBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.ra.RaLocaleBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class RaLocaleBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    JSF Managed Bean for handling localization of clients.

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage​(String messageKey,
                         Object... params)
        Find localized message template and replace the {number} place holders with the provided parameters. In the case where the localized language template is not available, the template from the default language will be tried.
        Parameters:
        messageKey - the message key
        params - to replace place holders with. Evaluated with String.valueOf() (null-safe).
        Returns:
        the localized message or "???messageKey???" if no key way found.

      • getErrorCodeMessage

        public String getErrorCodeMessage​(ErrorCode errorCode)
        Get localized error code.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - code
        Returns:
        localized error code

      • getFacesMessage

        public javax.faces.application.FacesMessage getFacesMessage​(String messageKey,
                                                            Object... params)
        Wraps the RaLocaleBean.getMessage()
        Parameters:
        messageKey - the message key
        params - to replace place holders with. Evaluated with String.valueOf() (null-safe).
        Returns:
        the localized message or "???messageKey???" if no key way found.
        See Also:
        getMessage(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...)
